channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices

item.title: CVE-2024-20873|2024-06-04T06:42:20.135Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in caminfo driver prior to SMR Jun-2024 Release 1 allows local privileged attackers to write out-of-bounds memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-20875|2024-06-04T06:42:22.497Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper caller verification vulnerability in SemClipboard prior to SMR June-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to access arbitrary files.

item.title: CVE-2024-20884|2024-06-04T06:42:33.122Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Incorrect use of privileged API vulnerability in getSemBatteryUsageStats in BatteryStatsService prior to SMR Jun-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to use privileged API.

item.title: CVE-2024-20876|2024-06-04T06:42:23.663Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper input validation in libsheifdecadapter.so prior to SMR Jun-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to lead to memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2024-20879|2024-06-04T06:42:27.225Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in libsavscmn.so prior to SMR Jun-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to write out-of-bounds memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-20881|2024-06-04T06:42:29.584Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in chnactiv TA prior to SMR Jun-2024 Release 1 allows local privileged attackers lead to potential arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-20883|2024-06-04T06:42:31.951Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Incorrect use of privileged API vulnerability in registerBatteryStatsCallback in BatteryStatsService prior to SMR Jun-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to use privileged API.

item.title: CVE-2024-20885|2024-06-04T06:42:34.285Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper component protection vulnerability in Samsung Dialer prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to make a call without proper permission.

item.title: CVE-2024-20877|2024-06-04T06:42:24.841Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Heap out-of-bound write vulnerability in parsing grid image header in libsavscmn.so prior to SMR Jun-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-20874|2024-06-04T06:42:21.299Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in SmartManagerCN prior to SMR Jun-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to launch privileged activities.

item.title: CVE-2024-20878|2024-06-04T06:42:26.067Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Heap out-of-bound write vulnerability in parsing grid image in libsavscmn.so prior to SMR June-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-20880|2024-06-04T06:42:28.400Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in bootloader prior to SMR Jun-2024 Release 1 allows physical attackers to overwrite memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-20882|2024-06-04T06:42:30.773Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability in bootloader prior to SMR June-2024 Release 1 allows physical attackers to arbitrary data access.

item.title: CVE-2024-20821|2024-05-07T04:25:21.354Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: A vulnerability possible to reconfigure OTP allows local attackers to transit RMA(Return Merchandise Authorization) mode, which disables security features. This attack needs additional privilege to control TEE.

item.title: CVE-2024-20860|2024-05-07T04:28:45.117Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper export of android application components vulnerability in TelephonyUI prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to reboot the device without proper permission.

item.title: CVE-2024-20817|2024-03-12T12:44:26.891Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Out-of-bounds Write vulnerabilities in svc1td_vld_slh of libsthmbc.so prior to SMR Feb-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to trigger buffer overflow.

item.title: CVE-2024-20856|2024-05-07T04:28:40.165Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in Secure Folder prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows physical attackers to access Secure Folder without proper authentication in a specific scenario.

item.title: CVE-2024-20857|2024-05-07T04:28:41.315Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in startListening of CocktailBarService prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to access information of current application.

item.title: CVE-2024-20816|2024-02-06T02:23:07.131Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in onCharacteristicWriteRequest in Auto Hotspot prior to SMR Feb-2024 Release 1 allows adjacent attackers connect to victim's mobile hotspot without user awareness.

item.title: CVE-2024-20861|2024-05-07T04:28:46.317Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Use after free vulnerability in SveService prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows local privileged attackers to cause memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2024-20836|2024-03-05T04:44:45.366Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Out of bounds Read vulnerability in ssmis_get_frm in libsubextractor.so prior to SMR Mar-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to read out of bounds memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-20820|2024-04-02T00:36:57.900Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper input validation in bootloader prior to SMR Feb-2024 Release 1 allows local privileged attackers to cause an Out-Of-Bounds read.

item.title: CVE-2024-20811|2024-02-06T02:23:01.334Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper caller verification in GameOptimizer prior to SMR Feb-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to configure GameOptimizer.

item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability while decoding hcr of libsavsac.so prior to SMR Apr-2024 Release 1 allows local attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-20831|2024-04-02T00:36:58.940Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Stack overflow in Little Kernel in bootloader prior to SMR Mar-2024 Release 1 allows local privileged attackers to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-20866|2024-05-07T04:28:53.604Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Authentication bypass vulnerability in Setupwizard prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows physical attackers to skip activation step.

item.title: CVE-2024-20830|2024-03-05T04:44:38.773Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Incorrect default permission in AppLock prior to SMR MAr-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to configure AppLock settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-20806|2024-01-04T01:10:14.875Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper access control in Notification service prior to SMR Jan-2024 Release 1 allows local attacker to access notification data.

item.title: CVE-2024-20847|2024-04-02T02:59:43.122Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper Access Control vulnerability in StorageManagerService prior to SMR Apr-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to read sdcard information.

item.title: CVE-2024-20810|2024-04-02T00:36:55.629Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Implicit intent hijacking vulnerability in Smart Suggestions prior to SMR Feb-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to get sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-20805|2024-04-02T00:37:44.324Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in ZipCompressor of MyFiles prior to SMR Jan-2024 Release 1 in Android 11 and Android 12, and version 14.5.00.21 in Android 13 allows local attackers to write arbitrary file.

item.title: CVE-2024-20844|2024-04-02T02:59:39.681Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability while parsing remaining codewords in libsavsac.so prior to SMR Apr-2024 Release 1 allows local attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: Out-of-bounds Write in padmd_vld_qtbl of libpadm.so prior to SMR Feb-2024 Release 1 allows local attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-20864|2024-05-07T04:28:50.999Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in DarManagerService prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to monitor system resources.

item.title: CVE-2024-20833|2024-03-05T08:08:35.007Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Use after free vulnerability in pub_crypto_recv_msg prior to SMR Mar-2024 Release 1 due to race condition allows local attackers with system privilege to cause memory corruption.

item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in text parsing implementation of libsdffextractor prior to SMR Apr-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to write out-of-bounds memory.

item.description: Out-of-bound Write vulnerability in chunk parsing implementation of libsdffextractor prior to SMR Apr-2023 Release 1 allows local attackers to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: Heap overflow in Little Kernel in bootloader prior to SMR Mar-2024 Release 1 allows local privileged attackers to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: Authentication bypass in bootloader prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows physical attackers to flash arbitrary images.

item.description: Out-of-bounds Write in padmd_vld_htbl of libpadm.so prior to SMR Feb-2024 Release 1 allows local attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability while releasing memory in libsavsac.so prior to SMR Apr-2024 Release 1 allows local attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in FileUriConverter of MyFiles prior to SMR Jan-2024 Release 1 in Android 11 and Android 12, and version 14.5.00.21 in Android 13 allows local attackers to write arbitrary file.

item.description: Out-of-bounds write in SveService prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows local privileged attackers to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in CustomFrequencyManagerService prior to SMR Mar-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to execute privileged behaviors.

item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in setCocktailHostCallbacks of CocktailBarService prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to access information of current application.

item.description: Out-of-bounds Write vulnerabilities in svc1td_vld_plh_ap of libsthmbc.so prior to SMR Feb-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to trigger buffer overflow.

item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in Bluetooth pairing process prior to SMR Jan-2024 Release 1 allows remote attackers to establish pairing process without user interaction.

item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in handling apdu of libsec-ril prior to SMR Apr-2024 Release 1 allows local privileged attackers to write out-of-bounds memory.

item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in onCharacteristicReadRequest in Auto Hotspot prior to SMR Feb-2024 Release 1 allows adjacent attackers connect to victim's mobile hotspot without user awareness.

item.description: Out-of-bounds Read in padmd_vld_ac_prog_refine of libpadm.so prior to SMR Feb-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers access unauthorized information.

item.description: Out-of-bound write vulnerability in command parsing implementation of libIfaaCa prior to SMR Apr-2024 Release 1 allows local privileged attackers to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in multitasking framework prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows physical attackers to access unlocked screen for a while.

item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung DeX prior to SMR Jan-2024 Release 1 allows owner to access other users' notification in a multi-user environment.

item.description: Out-of-bounds Write vulnerabilities in svc1td_vld_elh of libsthmbc.so prior to SMR Feb-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to trigger buffer overflow.

item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in FactoryCamera prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to take pictures without privilege.

item.title: CVE-2024-20834|2024-03-05T04:44:43.171Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: The sensitive information exposure vulnerability in WlanTest prior to SMR Mar-2024 Release 1 allows local attackers to access MAC address without proper permission.

item.title: CVE-2024-20863|2024-05-07T04:28:48.932Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
item.description: Out of bounds write vulnerability in SNAP in HAL prior to SMR May-2024 Release 1 allows local privileged attackers to execute arbitrary code.
